1500640.name: Scraps: Modular Vehicle Combat Soundtrack
1500640.description:
All the music related to Scraps: Modular Vehicle Combat. One song and five instrumentals. Includes all music from the game and two tracks from trailers.

Available as V0 (high quality variable bitrate) mp3 files, and as uncompressed original wav files.

If you don't need the uncompressed wavs, you can disable the high quality download option in your Steam settings. At the time of writing this is at Steam>Settings>Music, uncheck "Download high-quality audio files".
